title: Disclosure for firearm permit and registration purposes
context: [ยง134-3.5] Disclosure for firearm permit and registration purposes. A health care provider or public health authority shall disclose health information, including protected health care information, relating to an individual&rsquo;s mental health history, to the appropriate county chief of police in response to a request for the information from the chief of police; provided that: (1) The information shall be used only for the purpose of evaluating the individual&rsquo;s fitness to acquire or own a firearm; and (2) The individual has signed a waiver permitting release of the health information for that purpose.
